name.japanese: ジゴロウの三本のカトラス

description: Three identical cutlasses wielded by Jigoro in the Three Sword Style, mimicking Zoro's fighting style. These swords allow Jigoro to use Zoro's techniques that were transferred through his shadow.

abilities.description: Can be used to perform Three Sword Style techniques like Sanjuroku Pound Ho when wielded by someone with the appropriate shadow/abilities.

significance: These weapons demonstrate how General Zombies are equipped with appropriate tools to maximize the effectiveness of their implanted shadows. Jigoro's three cutlasses specifically enable him to replicate Zoro's Three Sword Style.
